nodes.text: Gort's Casino was a location on the moon Nar Shaddaa in Hutt Space.

Gort's Casino was mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released in 2011. Optional dialogue in the game allows the player character in the Bounty Hunter storyline to mention the casino while feigning surprise upon entering the Ugnaught Clan Warehouse in the Duros Sector of Nar Shaddaa.
